text: Ama'n aril laichei khan, enru, akawar sumphai'n inmani aleimakhu, halli sumphaiya inphut rasa inkhat in ajuoti, “Hiwa hi kiminriang tak kasapa kha eii, ama chungnga kamalung atai; nangni ama iti rangairu!” Inphut 22:2; Minpkla 2:7; Isa 42:1; Matt 3:17; 12:18; Mk 1:11; Luk 3:22; Innidan 18:15
